name: JamTime!
description:
A puzzle game where you navigate through a garden to find the Ultimate Jam. Legends say its deliciousness is unrivaled. Along the way, eat other jams to discover what is hidden in the world around you and find a path to your goal.

Credits:

  • Luka Derado -- Programming, Level Design
  • Erica Izaguirre -- Art
  • Travis Bittel -- Programming, Gameplay Design
  • Alan Tao -- Programming, Gameplay Design
  • Etim Otu -- Sound, Music

Some people have reported an issue with not being able to progress past the main menu. We are currently unable to reproduce this issue on our end and have yet to find a solution. Apologies if you are unable to play the game :(
